name: Block Hash Store Interface
description: This interface is used to store the block hash of a block number.

functionDecorators.name: Get Block Hash
functionDecorators.description: Returns the block hash of a block number.

parameterDecorators.name: blockNumber
parameterDecorators.description: The block number to get the block hash of.

returnDecorators.name: blockHash
returnDecorators.description: The block hash of the block number.
